com.facebook.buck.distributed

Class RecordingProjectFileHashCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.RecordingProjectFileHashCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectFileHashCache, ProjectFileHashLoader

    public class RecordingProjectFileHashCache
extends Object
implements ProjectFileHashCache
    Decorator class the records information about the paths being hashed as a side effect of producing file hashes required for rule key computation.
